description: Gale Frank is a 27-year-old mechanic on the Silvana flight deck crew. It is hinted that he might have a slight crush on Claus, especially around episodes 16-17, where first Lavie comments on his clothes smelling like Gale, and again in 17, where Gale snaps at the mechanics talking about Claus`s relationship with Sophia.
name: Gale Frank
